title: Ranked and bans/picks
body:
How is it that people go into ranked without understand the simple shit like that Devourer is disabled.

2 Master Yi bans in 2 games tonight (i dodged the second one)

I've seen Shyvana picked so many damn times.

Not to mention TF's, vayne's and the like.

It really really isn't that hard to see that devourer is disabled, hell you shouldn't go into any game without knowing what the Diamond ! is saying as it could directly affect your play.

replies.body:
I'm not seeing the problem with picking tf or vayne.
yeah sure, if you pick them jungle when devourer is disabled it's a bad idea.
but if you play them mid and adc respectively they're still strong champions.
No i mean as junglers, or i wouldn't have mentioned it.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rjlxdLbl,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-09-29T04:41:07.719+0000)
>
> No i mean as junglers, or i wouldn't have mentioned it.

ap tf could work, and if you pick vayne jun you deserve to lose anyway.
Runeglaive TF sucks shit, as you basically put yourself as a mid laner with less gold which helps nothing, and less experience also helping nothing.
Runeglaive Kayle is just better than devourer imo, and even more so after 5.19.
If that diamond thing wasn't up 100% of the time then people may be more inclined to check it when it does pop up

Cinderhulk Shyv isn't that bad, seeing as while you can go a more offensive oriented build; HP stacking with your passive stat bonuses makes you incredibly tanky and it's quite easy to rack up +500 HP from Cinderhulk with a Warmogs and Deadman's plate (25% bonus so like 1K bonus HP is 250 but u get my point).

Can understand why you wouldn't Yi without Devourer's though. Heaps of people don't even read patch notes though, heaps of people don't put in the same effort and dedication as others and a lot of the time people don't bother checking the exclamation marks etc. It isn't very straightforward and it's easily missed also. Sometimes people may assume it's the same notice as last time they were online too (For example might think it is referencing a previous disabled champ or w/e and not bother double checking).
